turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order two pizzas from Marcos Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store in which city?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Marcos Pizza in North Liberty, Iowa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First, I would like the Meat Supremo from Marcos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the large, 14 inch, pizza of this specialty pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like thin crust, deep dish, or regular crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the large meat supremo is be in the thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any of the crust toppers on this pizza? They have garlic, parmesean, or roma, or any combination.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like all crust toppers on this large thin pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Does that complete your pizza order for your first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the second one I would like another large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like this one to be thin crust, deep dish, or regular crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like this one to be the regular crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like on this large regular crust pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like this one to be another specialty, the Hawaiian Chicken Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the crust toppers on this pizza also?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like all crust toppers on this pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any drinks or desserts from Marcos Pizza in North Liberty?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add a 2 liter to this order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which type of 2 liter would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Pepsi 2 liter to be added to this order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Does this complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that will be all, can you repeat my order back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want two pizzas that are larges. The first one will be a large thin meat supremo pizza with all crust toppers. The second will be regular crust with Hawaiian Chicken specialty with all crust toppers. You also want a 2 liter of Pepsi. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes this is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt has been emailed to your email account. Your pizzas will be ready to be picked up from Marcos Pizza in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, I appreciate it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is my pleasure, have a good night.

items.name: Marcos Pizza in North Liberty, Iowa
